install:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Update system packages
sudo apt-get update

# Install Flutter dependencies
sudo apt-get install -y curl git unzip xz-utils zip libglu1-mesa wget

# Install Chrome for web development
wget -q -O - https://dl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | sudo apt-key add -
echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable || echo "Chrome installation failed, continuing..."

# Install Linux development tools (optional for desktop development)
sudo apt-get install -y ninja-build libgtk-3-dev mesa-utils || echo "Linux dev tools installation failed, continuing..."

# Install Flutter if not already installed
if [ ! -d "$HOME/flutter" ]; then
  echo "Installing Flutter..."
  cd $HOME
  git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1
  echo 'export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc
  export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH"
else
  echo "Flutter already installed"
  export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH"
fi

# Configure Flutter
flutter config --no-analytics
flutter doctor -v
flutter precache --web

# Find the correct workspace directory
WORKSPACE_DIR="/workspace"
if [ ! -d "$WORKSPACE_DIR" ]; then
  WORKSPACE_DIR="$(pwd)"
fi

echo "Using workspace directory: $WORKSPACE_DIR"
cd "$WORKSPACE_DIR"

# Install project dependencies if pubspec.yaml exists
if [ -f "pubspec.yaml" ]; then
  flutter pub get
  # Run build_runner if available
  dart run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs || echo "No build_runner found, skipping..."
else
  echo "No pubspec.yaml found, skipping pub get"
fi

# Make scripts executable
chmod +x scripts/*.sh || echo "No scripts found, skipping..."

echo "Flutter environment setup complete!"
echo "Workspace: $WORKSPACE_DIR"

terminals.name: Flutter Web Dev
terminals.command: export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH" && cd /workspace 2>/dev/null || cd $(pwd) && flutter run -d web-server --web-port 8080 --web-hostname 0.0.0.0

terminals.name: Test Runner
terminals.command: export PATH="$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH" && cd /workspace 2>/dev/null || cd $(pwd) && flutter test --reporter=compact
